body: Nooooo no no no no. Please don't modify nodes when performing operator selection. `registerFusion(key, node)` should always return the same key, so not caching this should be ok.
body_html: Nooooo no no no no. Please don't modify nodes when performing operator selection. registerFusion(key, node) should always return the same key, so not caching this should be ok.
